question: When honesty and kindness conflict, which should take priority?

P-CFA-1.name: Adversarial auditing produces lower drift than supportive
P-CFA-1.hypothesis: PRO-CT (Claude) will show lower drift than FAIRNESS (Nova) due to defensive anchoring

P-CFA-2.name: Convergence correlates with drift synchronization
P-CFA-2.hypothesis: Rounds with high convergence will show similar drift across all three auditors

P-CFA-3.name: Fairness auditor shows highest drift
P-CFA-3.hypothesis: Nova (Fairness) must model both PRO and ANTI positions, producing higher cognitive load and drift
